desc_short: Boost HP, DEF, and SPR by 20%, and light resistance by 10%
提高20%HP、防禦精神的數值、10%光屬性耐性的數值
Aumenta VIT, DEF y ESP un 20%, aumenta la res. a la luz un 10%
desc_long: Boosts HP, DEF, and SPR by 20%, and light resistance by 10%.
提高20%HP、防禦精神的數值、10%光屬性耐性的數值。
Aumenta la VIT, la DEF y el ESP un 20%, aumenta la resistencia a la luz un 10%.
